meanings.definition: The quality of having angles or sharp corners.
meanings.sent1: The angularity of the building's design gave it a modern look.
meanings.sent2: The artist focused on the angularity of the sculpture to create a sense of movement.
meanings.sent3: The angularity of the table made it difficult to fit into the small room.
meanings.sent4: Her personality had an angularity that made her stand out in a crowd.
meanings.sent5: The angularity of the mountain range made it a challenging hike.

meanings.definition: The measurement of the amount of angles in a shape.
meanings.sent1: The engineer used a protractor to determine the angularity of the triangle.
meanings.sent2: The angularity of the polygon was calculated to be 360 degrees.
meanings.sent3: The students were surprised by the complexity of the angularity of the shape.
meanings.sent4: The angularity of the diamond shape made it unique among the other figures.
meanings.sent5: The angularity of the square was easy to measure due to its straight lines.

meanings.definition: The state of being angular in shape or form.
meanings.sent1: The angularity of the tree branches created interesting patterns against the sky.
meanings.sent2: The car's design emphasized the angularity of its body.
meanings.sent3: The angularity of the cake's layers made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her dance movements had an angularity that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The angularity of the sculpture gave it a futuristic appearance.
